pkmkdoc.description:
This will install the APC40 DJ Template, along with the APCAdvanced remote script.
Installing will close Ableton!

choice.title: DJ Template Project
choice.description: The template itself: an Ableton Live Set (.als) file.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138\cocoasubrtf320 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Hi,\ \ This tool will install the following three things:\ \ 1: A copy of the DJ Template Pro\ 2: A copy of the APCAdvanced script\ 3: A dark Ableton theme\ \ See http://willmarshall.me for more information.\ \ Please note: this installer will fail unless you have a copy of Live 8 installed in the CORRECT place, e.g.\ \ /Applications/Ableton Live 8\ \ If you've moved Ableton or are using an old (pre 8.3) version this will NOT work.}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1138\cocoasubrtf320 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 Thanks for installing the DJ Template!\ \ The template has been installed to your Documents folder.\ \ The APCAdvanced control surface is now available in the MIDI preferences in the most recent version of Ableton installed on your machine.\ \ To activate it, select "APCAdvanced" from the Control Surface drop down in your Ableton MIDI preferences. This should replace the APC40 Control Surface, and should have the same MIDI settings.\ \ To active the "Dark" theme, select it from the "Skin" drop down in Ableton's Look/Feel preferences.\ \ -W}
